note:
Coming from Serbia, I love Technology and I live for technology. I use Arch Linux (vanilla) mainly dual-booted with Windows 11. I work on my own Game, Web, and VPS host called 0x001host and it will be soon dropped publicly. Also, I do create projects just to run them one time and then switch to the next project, and repeat.

What I usually say is "Grind until you die."

My CV: https://infectedw.me

#linux #archlinux #popos #windows #nature

name: What do I love?
value: Distro hopping, usually to Ubuntu-based OS like Pop_Os!, Kubuntu, Linux Mint, etc but I always end up on Arch, also I love Hiking, exploring the woods, walking, and sitting near rivers. My dream is to own a house in the middle of the woods.

name: What Operating System do I use?
value:
I use Arch on my main PC, for production servers I use Ubuntu 22.04 or Debian 11 and for test servers, I use Arch and I love to maintain Arch servers. 

Also on my laptop, I started using FreeBSD recently and I love it!

name: Want to contact me?
value: Here are some of the emails I use: petardimicmain@gmail.com 0x001host@gmail.com Also, you can see all links here: https://linktr.ee/0x001

name: What is my job?
value: I repair computers and everything related to them as my primary income job, also I create VoIP infrastructure for companies (I'm on contract), I fix computers privately and work on my hosting called 0x001 host (0x001.cloud)
